official_title: To provide an 8 percent pay increase for Federal employees within the Chicago-Gary-Lake County, IL-IN-WI Consolidated Metropolitan Statistical Area.

summary.text: Extends an eight percent interim geographic pay adjustment (as provided under the Federal Employees Pay Comparability Act of 1990 to certain General Schedule employees and in certain high cost-of-living areas) to General Schedule employees in the Chicago-Gary-Lake County Consolidated Metropolitan Statistical Area in the States of Illinois, Indiana, and Wisconsin.

titles.title: To provide an 8 percent pay increase for Federal employees within the Chicago-Gary-Lake County, IL-IN-WI Consolidated Metropolitan Statistical Area.
